scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n hub,backbone -c blue,green "npm run dev:hub" "npm run dev:backbone"
scripts.platform:up: dotenv -o -e .env -- docker compose -f docker-compose.platform.yml -f docker-compose.platform.dev-ports.yml up -d
scripts.platform:down: dotenv -o -e .env -- docker compose -f docker-compose.platform.yml -f docker-compose.platform.dev-ports.yml down
scripts.platform:ps: dotenv -o -e .env -- docker compose -f docker-compose.platform.yml -f docker-compose.platform.dev-ports.yml ps
scripts.platform:logs: dotenv -o -e .env -- docker compose -f docker-compose.platform.yml -f docker-compose.platform.dev-ports.yml logs -f
